channel.title: Oletools on Policy to Packets
channel.description: Recent content in Oletools on Policy to Packets

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - MSHTML
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing malicious Office documents exploiting MSHTML (CVE-2021-40444), using oletools to extract indicators, identify malicious domains and IPs, and investigate document-based exploitation.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - Excel 4.0 Macros
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing a malicious Excel 4.0 (XLM) macro document using XLMMacroDeobfuscator and oletools to identify process execution, regsvr32 abuse, and DLL payload behavior.
